data.name: lblRecentRssEntriesMax.Help
data.value: You can limit the number of RSS entries for Most recent entries.

data.name: lblRecentEntriesMax.Help
data.value: You can limit the number of entries for Most recent entries.

data.name: lblSummary.Help
data.value: Enter the desired cutoff in characters for the auto-generated summary of blog entries. To set no limit, enter a value of 0. Use the avanced option labeled Enforce Summary Truncation to also truncate entries with summaries. The default is to only truncate auto-generated summaries.

data.name: lblPortalSearchOption.Help
data.value: For use the global Portal Search Options for Blog Content you can control it with the options below

data.name: lblUploadOption.Help
data.value: If you enable this option you give users the permission to upload images and attachments to their blog entry.

data.name: lblMandatory.Help
data.value: When entering a blog entry, this setting forces the user to enter a summary of their blog entry.

data.name: lblSearchSummary.Help
data.value: It is strongly suggested that during search operations you limit the length of the entry returned so that results can be scanned quickly.

data.name: lblShowSummary.Help
data.value: If this option is enabled, the summary (if available) will be shown on the top of the single entry view.

data.name: cmdGenerateLinks.Text
data.value: Regenerate all Permalinks for this Module

data.name: lblPageBlogs.Help
data.value: Select the blog which should be used on this tab. For a general Blog page please don't select a specific Blog

data.name: lblEnableDNNSearch.Help
data.value: If you enabled this option the content of that module will be indexed by the DNN search, please take care of that you only enbable this option for one module (your main blog page), if you enable this option for more then one module you will get duplicated search results

data.name: lblShowUniqueTitle.Help
data.value: If you enable this option a blog specific title will be displayed in the title bar of the browser

data.name: lblMaxImageWidth.Help
data.value: You can limit the image width to a maximum with this option

data.name: lblBookmarksInfo.Text
data.value: Select which Social Bookmark and Network sites you wish to enable for your blogs.

data.name: lblBookmarksInfo.Help
data.value:
Select which Social Bookmark and Network sites you wish to enable for your blogs.
We have taken the liberty to select the most common and most popular networks.

data.name: lblShowGravatars.Help
data.value: Check to show Gravatar images next to comments.

data.name: lblGravatarImageWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the width of the Gravatar image. The default width (48) matches the default style of the comments

data.name: lblGravatarRating.Help
data.value: Gravatar images are rated based on the content. G rated images are appropriate for all audiences while PG, R and X rated images may contain inappropriate for some audiences.

data.name: lblGravatarDefaultImageUrl.Help
data.value:
These images will be used for comments left by users without a Gravatar.
About Identicon, Wavicon, and MonsterID: Gravatar will be displayed for users who have one, otherwise, a unique identifying image will be created for them based on the IP address of their computer, or on their email address if provided.
About custom images: provide the complete URL to the image (including "http://")

data.name: lblShowSeoFriendlyUrl.Help
data.value: If you enable this option, then the URL will be modified to replace default.aspx with the title of the blog entry as follows: .../Blog-Entry-Title.aspx. This URL format can help with search engine optimization. The default is set to true.

data.name: lblEnableBookmarks.Help
data.value: If you enable this option, a social bookmarks toolbar will be added to your blog entry page.

data.name: lblShowWebsite.Help
data.value: Check to allow website to be included with comment.

data.name: lblGravatarDefaultImageCustomURL.Help
data.value: URL to custom avatar image (including "http://"). Used only if "Custom" is selected above.

data.name: lblShowTitle.Help
data.value: Check to allow users to create unique titles for entry comments

data.name: lblRegenerateLinks.Help
data.value: Regenerate the permalink saved for the entries shown in this module. This is useful mainly for regenerating the permalinks after a change has been made to the URL format for a site.

data.name: lblAllowCommentAnchors.Help
data.value: Check to allow hyperlinks to be entered in comments.

data.name: lblAllowCommentImages.Help
data.value: Check to allow images to be included in comments.

data.name: lblAllowCommentFormatting.Help
data.value: Check to allow basic formatting in comments (b or strong, i or em, u and blockquote)

data.name: lblEnforceSummaryTruncation.Help
data.value: Checking this option will cause both auto-generated and actual entry summaries to be truncated based on the value entered in the 'Limit Entry Summary To' setting above.

data.name: rblGravatarRating_pg.Text
data.value: PG - Possibly offensive, typically suitable for audiences 13 and above

data.name: rblGravatarRating_r.Text
data.value: R - Intended for audiences 17 and above

data.name: rblGravatarRating_x.Text
data.value: X - Even more mature than R
